 Existential uniqueness "pick" showing wff equivalence.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Nov-1994.)
statement: eupickb $p |- ( ( E! x ph /\ E! x ps /\ E. x ( ph /\ ps ) ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
